Package org.firebirdsql.gds.ng.wire.version16

Class Version16Descriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firebirdsql.gds.ng.wire.AbstractProtocolDescriptor
      • org.firebirdsql.gds.ng.wire.version16.Version16Descriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProtocolDescriptor
    public final class Version16Descriptor
extends AbstractProtocolDescriptor
implements ProtocolDescriptor
    The ProtocolDescriptor for the Firebird version 16 protocol. This version applies to Firebird 4, but also works with newer Firebird versions.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Mark Rotteveel
